title-group.article-title: Family-Systems Psychotherapy and Psychoanalytic Literary Criticism: A Comparative Critique

abstract.p: After considering some limitations of psychoanalytic criticism, this essay argues for family-systems psychotherapy as a developing paradigm for psychological literary criticism. The essay then analyzes differences between Freud's "family romance" and family-system therapy's "family dance."
